items.title: Create Simple Input Form
items.description: Develop a basic web form with fields for name, email, and message, and a submit button.
acceptance_criteria: Form includes fields for name, email, and message
Submit button sends form data to a specified endpoint
All fields are required and validated before submission
Email field validates proper email format
non_functional: Form loads within 2 seconds on standard broadband
Form is responsive on mobile and desktop devices

notes: User request was vague; assumed a basic contact form with minimal fields and standard validation.
